title: Ticket #4079: job_core_niceuser_van can't run repeatedly
description: job_core_niceuser_van can't be run repeatedly. It always writes to the same job log file, then reads that log file to determine when the job completes. As a result, after the first successful run, the jobs are considered to have exited immediately, causing other problems.
remarks:
2013-Nov-18 14:37:13 by adesmet:
Fixed. It unlinks the log file before starting the job up.
